frequency.description: Frequency for RT60 and DSR values
frequency.gltf_detailedDescription: Frequency for the provided RT60 and DSR values.

RT60.description: Specifies RT60 value in `second` for the frequency provided in the `frequency` field
RT60.gltf_detailedDescription: Specifies RT60 value in `second` for the frequency provided in the `frequency` field

DSR.description: Specifies Diffuse-to-Source Ratio value in dB for the frequency provided in the `frequency` field.
DSR.gltf_detailedDescription: Specifies Diffuse-to-Source Ratio value in dB for the frequency provided in the `frequency` field. For details see ISO/IEC 23090-14:5.4.1.4.
